title: Spencer Hall on Tennessee Being Back, the Alabama Fire Drill, and Slap Fights
description:
Bomani Jones and Spencer Hall of The Shutdown Fullcast discuss Tennessee's return to prominence (2:07), why this looks like the tail end of the Nick Saban era at Alabama (15:10), and a professional slap fighting league (33:45). 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
